title: Dodgeball - Crystal Scar
body:
♠Ultimate Dodgeball♠
THIS IS A 3v3(trust me way better with a 3v3)
> How to Play

1. you must choose a champion THAT can skillshot(ofcourse)etc. nidalee, lee sin, ez
 - YOU CAN USE ANYTHING THAT'S A SKILLSHOT
2. in GAME everyone must go to the middle of the jungle
3. when you guys are ready start chucking stuff at EACH OTHER(DO NOT PASS THE LINE)
4. if you die your out_____wait till next round to start
5. If your team ♠Wins♠ capture the ♠Top♠ turret --> If you win again ♠Don't♠ capture any turrets until the other team ♠Wins♠ then they get to capture the top turret.
- So basically you guys fight for the top turret...Dodgeball Style 
- You can heal yourself or others IF you have a healing ABILITY(etc. nidalee heal, soroka heal)

> What NOT to do 

1. No cheating 
2. No POTS 
3. no TROLLING
4. you CAN'T use {{champion:412}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:111}} PULLS

> PERMA BANS

-  {{champion:22}} (volley so BIG)
-  {{champion:101}} (way too OP)
- {{champion:161}} (same with xerath)
- {{champion:81}} (op as ****)

> SPELLS THAT YOU CAN'T USE

{{summoner:14}}
